page.title: 12Sights Along The River Leam
page.content: Many varieties of flowers and trees can be found growing along the banks of the River Leam. We identified as many of the plants as we could and made a note of their names. Below is a list of the flowers that we found. Daisy, Snapdragon, Woad, Early Purple Orchid, Red Campian, Common Vetch, Deadly Nightshade, Groundsel, Dog Rose, Hedge Woundwort, White Clover, Shepherds Purse and Dandelion. As well as the plants, the banks of the Leam supports many birds and insects. We made a list of the creatures that we saw. Below is a list of the most common sightings:- BIRDS Robin, Blackbird, Wood Pigeon, Crow, Great Tit, Thrush, Moorhen, Mallard. INSECTS Ants, Cabbage White, Bees, Wasps,Gnats, Ladybirds.
